job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: ltstronggtltugtdescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtdesigns develops and troubleshoots basic software programs for computer based systemsltbrgtltulgtltligtparticipates in the development and review of specifications to gain an understanding of application changesltligtltligtcompletes basic program changes to translate specifications and or requirements into codeltligtltligtapplies basic technical skills to produce deliverables ie specifications program changes unit test scripts documentation etcltligtltligtprovides documentation to support program changesltligtltligtplans documents and executes unit test plans to ensure all code changes meet requirements specificationsltligtltligtsupports programming changes during quality assurance user acceptance testing and post implementation to ensure integrity of applicationltligtltligtmonitors progress against task estimates to provide statusltligtltligtcomplies with standards and procedures to ensure development consistency eg programming standards change management version controlltligtltulgtltstronggtrequirementsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelors degree in computerrelated discipline or equivalent work experienceltligtltligtusing one or more programming languagesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtour commitmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtpaychex is dedicated to fostering a culture of intentional inclusion and diversity iampampd our valued employees and commitment to iampampd is the essence of our internal and external success inclusivity is a key value of our corporate culture and is exemplified through our reputation as a top employer for employee development diversity and ethics as well as a focus on fairness in recruitment selection and decision makingltbrgtltbrgtclick here for more information on our corporate social responsibility
